detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Capstone’s Labor and Employment practice features some of the state’s most experienced employment attorneys. They have certified multiple employee classes and negotiated millions of dollars in settlements over the course of their careers.

detailsData.title: Appellate Victories
detailsData.content: Capstone’s attorneys have achieved important appellate victories on behalf of employees. For example, in Brown v. Ralphs Grocery Co., the California Court of Appeal carved out an exception to the federal preemption of claims brought under the California Labor Code’s Private Attorneys General Act.

detailsData.title: Broad Industry Experience
detailsData.content: Capstone litigates cases on behalf of employees across a broad range of industries, including retail, food services, medical, insurance, banking, and securities. This diverse experience allows them to handle complex cases effectively.

detailsData.title: Commitment to Social Justice
detailsData.content: As part of their commitment to social justice, Capstone supports public policy, educational campaigns, and legislative efforts. They aim to secure and expand the rights of consumers and working people.

valueProp: At Capstone Law APC, we believe that employees should be treated fairly, consumers should get what they pay for, and rights should be protected even when someone cannot afford a lawyer. Capstone Law seeks to represent employees, consumers and investors across the country in litigation involving labor and workplace rights, privacy laws, automobile and other product defects, consumer protection, false advertising or other deceptive trade practices, and securities fraud.
